subject: Re: [Read_Alphabet] Re: Shaw Alphabet Books is now online.

messageBody:
On 31 Dec 2012, at 08:20, "Tim" <rubik67@...> wrote:

--- In Read_Alphabet@yahoogroups.com, Sid Tanaban <sidban2@...> wrote:

> I couldn't read anything - even the fonts.

How very odd. I don't really know how to explain that. Is your screen set darker than normal?

Screen shot of your page shows deep deep black.

Michael Everson * http://www.evertype.com/
